nodes.text:
(alias) const toEventSelector: (fn: string | AbiFunction | AbiEvent) => `0x${string}`
import toEventSelector
nodes.docs: Returns the event selector for a given event definition.
tags:
const selector = toEventSelector('Transfer(address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256 amount)')
// 0xddf252ad1be2c89b69c2b068fc378daa952ba7f163c4a11628f55a4df523b3ef

nodes.text:
(alias) toEventSelector(fn: string | AbiFunction | AbiEvent): `0x${string}`

nodes.docs: Returns the hash (of the function/event signature) for a given event or function definition.
